home.title: Hello There!
home.subtitle: Passionate Full Stack Developer 🚀
home.description: I'm a curious learner and tech enthusiast from SKCET, constantly exploring new tools and technologies to build impactful digital solutions.
home.exploringLanguagesDescription: I enjoy solving real-world problems with code, participating hackathons 🏆, and contributing to open-source. Always up for learning new tech!
home.homePageMessage: Whether it’s tech talk or collaboration, I’m always open to new ideas. Check out my projects and let’s build something amazing!
